item.title: St Regis Resort
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description:
The Utimate Scape

Special limited offer: Ending Soon!
item.content:encoded:
Ultimate adventure

Escape to the Paradise of Punta Mita with our exclusive package at the luxurious St. Regis Resort. Indulge in a two night stay in a breathtaking ocean view room and start each day with a delicious breakfast for two. Take your pick from two half-day boat excursions, where you can customize your own adventure, and make the most of our beach toy rentals during an hour each day. Plus, we will take care of all your transportation needs with our round-trip airport transfers. Get ready to be swept away by the beauty of Punta Mita – book now and get ready for a once in a lifetime experience!

Features

  • Two night stay at St. Regis Resort for two people
  • Breakfast included
  • Two half  days in 24 feet boat with the experience of your choice(Inshore Fishing, Reef Hunting, Cruising and Snorkel)
  • Add – one hour beach toys (Sea-Doo or Kayak Fishing)
  • Round-trip airport transportation

Luxury Retreat

Experience that you ultimate luxury retreat in Punta Mita with our exclusive package at the luxurious St Regis resort. Spend four unforgettable nights in a stunning ocean view room, and wake up to a delicious breakfast for two each morning. Choose from three half-day boat excursions, where you can create your own personalized itinerary and enjoy extended beach activities with our beach toy rental available for two hours each day. Plus, enjoy the convenience of our private round-trip airport transfers. Get ready to unwind in the lap of luxury, surrounded by the natural beauty of Punta Mita. Don’t miss out on this exclusive experience – book your spot now for the ultimate Punta Mita getaway!

Features

  • Four night stay at St. Regis Resort for two people
  • Breakfast included
  • Three half  days in 24 feet boat with the experience of your choice(Inshore Fishing, Reef Hunting, Cruising and Snorkel)
  • Add – on 2 hour beach toys (Sea-Doo or Kayak Fishing)
  • Round-trip airport transportation

 

Enhance your Punta Mita experience with our exclusive PADI scuba diving add-on package. For just $500 you can complete your certification with two half-day pool sessions, with the boat already included in your three half-day excursions. Don’t miss out on this unique opportunity to explore the underwater wonders of Punta Mita – Book Now!
